title: Carn Mo'r
description: Set in the Ladder hills on the boundaries between the Grampians and the Cairngorms in the 1950s in the Highlands of Scotland. In a land shrouded by mist and mystery, the Sir Alasdair Sinclair, Laird of Carn Moâ€™r, Chieftain of the Highland Sinclair's has to battle against the wishes of his clan for the hand of the American woman he has fallen in love with.
author: J.W. Murison
